title: Wtb: psa or sgc graded zack wheat

posts.post_title: Wtb: psa or sgc graded zack wheat
posts.post_content: Looking for a nicely centered copy in 3 to 4.5 grade

I apologize profusely because this card was in my pile of duplicates. 
however, when I went to look for my other example, it was not to be found. :eek:
I am so very & honestly sorry for this extremely numbnutz mistake. :confused:
please forgive my ineptitude, and good luck in your quest.
sincerely,
mark
